title: Fearing the Worst (2R100)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Stealth. To play, exert 2 Hobbits. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each search card and each tracker is +2.
Lore:	”'Even if we are allowed to leave Bree unhindered, we can hardly hope now to leave it unnoticed.'”
Rarity:	R
